title: For determining eligibility of ITP, the above 2% area shall be considered in area calculation
clause_text: For determining eligibility of ITP, the above 2% area shall be considered in area calculation. This area shall not contain area under hill slopes, and shall be accessible by major road. Base FSI of such 2% land shall be made available to the (1) project proponent/s on remaining land (1) of the ITP area.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
